name: Investment Run
summary: Start from rags and get to the moon by making the right investments! Walk your way to the finish line by collecting money and avoiding obstacles! Beware of the gold diggers, they try to take all your money away from you! Will you reach your private helicopter and create your own empire on it? Will you become the new Jeff Bezos / Warren Buffet / Elon Musk? Simple and intuitive game for everybody to become rich and stay away from poverty! Controls are easy, you will love it!
